abstract_summ: 291 patients with COVID-19 were categorized into mild group (10.0%), moderate group (72.8%) and severe/critical group (17.2%) Median age of all patients was 46 years (49.8% were male) 86.6% patients had an indirect exposure history . Fever (68.7%), cough (60.5%), and fatigue (31.6%) were common symptoms especially for severe and critical patients .
